author: James Joyce
text: Dear Mr Sykes: I sent back typescript of Le Voile du Bonheur today and am writing by this post to Mr Ballou (?). I hope it will be a success. Circe progresses. Am very busy flat hunting. Exiles is already translated and will be produced by M. Lugné-Poe, and Mme Suzanne Després in December or January. Best wishes for your season Sincerely yours James Joyce
